name.ja: <ruby>終刻決壊<rt>ドゥームズ・デストラクション</rt></ruby>

text.en:
Target 1 "Doom-Z" Xyz Monster you control; equip this card to it as an Equip Card with this effect.
● Your opponent cannot add cards from the Deck to the hand, except by drawing them.
If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip 1 "Doom-Z" monster from your Deck to it. You can only use each effect of "Doom-Z Destruction" once per turn.
